00233 #define SC_BYTES_IN_WORD            2        
00239 #define SC_ATS_HEADER_SIZE (sizeof(SC_AtsEntryHeader_t) - CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE)
00240 #define SC_RTS_HEADER_SIZE (sizeof(SC_RtsEntryHeader_t) - CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE)
00241 
00246 #define SC_ERROR                -1
00247 
00252 #define SC_CMD_PIPE_NAME        "SC_CMD_PIPE"
00253 
00255 #define SC_ATS_HDR_WORDS          (sizeof(SC_AtsEntryHeader_t) / 2)
00256 #define SC_ATS_HDR_NOPKT_WORDS    (SC_ATS_HDR_WORDS - (CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE / 2))
00257 
00258 #define SC_DUP_TEST_UNUSED  -1

00260 /*********************************************************************************************/
00261 
00265 typedef struct
00266 {
00267     /* Command identifier, range = 1 to SC_MAX_ATS_CMDS */
00268     uint16  CmdNumber;
00269 
00270     /* 32 bit absolute time, stored as two 16 bit values */
00271     uint16  TimeTag1;
00272     uint16  TimeTag2;
00273 
00274     /* Command packet header */
00275     uint8   CmdHeader[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];
00276 
00277     /*
00278     ** Note: the command packet data is variable length,
00279     **       only the command packet header is shown here.
00280     */
00281 
00282 }SC_AtsEntryHeader_t;
00283 
00284 
00288 typedef struct {
00289     /* The Cmd Header comes after the Time tag so the
00290        Cmd Header butts up against the rest of the cFE command */
00291     SC_RelTimeTag_t     TimeTag;
00292     uint8               CmdHeader[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];
00293     /* Note: This structure has natural alignment and needs no padding */
00294 }SC_RtsEntryHeader_t;
00295 
00299 typedef struct
00300 {
00301     CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t         MsgPtr;                             
00302     CFE_SB_PipeId_t         CmdPipe;                            
00304     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        AtsTblHandle[SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS];     
00305     uint16*                 AtsTblAddr[SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS];       
00307     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        AppendTblHandle;                    
00308     uint16*                 AppendTblAddr;                      
00310     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        RtsTblHandle[SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS];     
00311     uint16*                 RtsTblAddr[SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS];       
00313     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        AtsInfoHandle;                      
00314     SC_AtsInfoTable_t*      AtsInfoTblAddr;                     
00316     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        AppendInfoHandle;

00323     SC_RtpControlBlock_t*   RtsCtrlBlckAddr;                    
00325     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        AtsCtrlBlckHandle;                  
00326     SC_AtpControlBlock_t*   AtsCtrlBlckAddr;                    
00328     CFE_TBL_Handle_t        AtsCmdStatusHandle[SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS];   
00329     uint8*                  AtsCmdStatusTblAddr[SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS];  
00331     int32                   AtsDupTestArray[SC_MAX_ATS_CMDS];   
00333     uint16                  NumCmdsSec;                         
00335     SC_HkTlm_t              HkPacket;                           
00338 } SC_OperData_t;

00343 typedef struct
00344 {
00345     uint8                   ContinueAtsOnFailureFlag ; 
00349     uint16                  AtsTimeIndexBuffer[SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS][SC_MAX_ATS_CMDS]; 
00355     int32                   AtsCmdIndexBuffer[SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS][SC_MAX_ATS_CMDS]; 
00356   
00357     uint8                   NextProcNumber;   
00358     SC_AbsTimeTag_t         NextCmdTime[2];
